grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence package¶

Submodules¶

grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence.AbstractSequence module¶

Abstract Keras Sequence object for running models on huge datasets.

grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence.AbstractSequence.batch_size¶

Return batch size property of the sequence.

grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence.AbstractSequence.elapsed_epochs¶

Return elapsed epochs since training started.

grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence.AbstractSequence.sample_number¶

Return total number of samples in sequence.

grape.embiggen.sequences.abstract_sequence.AbstractSequence.steps_per_epoch¶

Number of steps to execute on the sequence.
